transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Madan Lal ji, Ranjit ji ki aapne call pe na not satisfied diya hai, mai usi ke liye hi aapko bas call laga rahi hu. Unki call se aapko kuch...
Customer: Haan, aaj ko mana kiya tha maine unhe. Kal baat kar lena. Mai party me gaya hua tha, pee rakhi hai, mai isliye baat karna nahi chah raha hu. Ab aap mera muh khula rahi hai.
Executive: Ladke ki baat sun lo yaha ka.
Executive: Sir, mai koi discussion aisa nahi karna chah rahi hu. Mai bas ye puch rahi hu, Ranjit ne aapse discussion me jo kuch kiya tha...
Customer: Kal Ranjit ji se baat karke kal final kar dunga.
Executive: Sir, sir suniye, payment ki baat nahi kar rahi hu. Aapne na unki call pe not satisfied diya hai, yaani ki aapki jo discussion service ko unhone kara, aap kuch nahi...
Customer: Haan, haan, not satisfied, haan maine. Not satisfied isliye kiya ki ye baat kar rahe, aisa hota hai beta, har saal hum ye dekhte hai in logo ko ki jis time bhi inko humare ko aise dena dena hota hai, to ye sab clear karte hai. Uske baad me koi care nahi hoti. Isliye ye likha maine not satisfied. Aaj se nahi, aapka bahut purana member hu. Experience yehi hai ki ye baad me koi parwah nahi karte. Kaun hai, kya hai, chalan do gaddi. Inhone mere ko... kya kar raha hu mai phir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Meri suno, meri suno. Mere ko ye, ye tha ki pehle ye log mujhe paisa lete the 3 saal ka aur mere ko provide karte the India bhi, foreign ka bhi. Dusre saal, teesre, dusre saal inhone ye kaha ki bhai hum foreign trade alag se karenge, India alag se karenge. Agreement koi baat to nahi hui na? To inhone baat tod di. Phir maine abse is saal socha ki kyun na seedhe India se deal kiya jaaye. Aur unse mera deal bada achha chal raha hai. Unke se link me hu. Wo mere ko dono facility de rahe hai. Ye baat hai aur kuch nahi hai. Yehi maine Ranjit ji ko kal kaha tha ki beta mai do din busy ke hai, parso aapse final kar dunga, jo bhi karna hai.
Executive: Haan, haan. Theek hai, aap mujhe batao ye jo service...
Customer: Aur jo karunga likhit me karunga. Jo karunga likhit leke karunga. Waise nahi karunga.
Executive: Haan, likhit me le lijiyega.
Executive: Mai bas aapse ye puch rahi hu service me jo aap keh rahe ho ki aapko call nahi karta koi baad me, to aap batao usme kya solution karwaau to mai us hisab se aapko saari cheeze...
Customer: Dekhiye, mere bacche, mai ye keh raha hu, jab meri abhi aapse ye baat hui, mai zubaan ka pakka hu. Abhi baat hui ki bhai hum aapko India bhi denge aur bahar ka bhi buylead diya karenge. Par inhone bahar ka dena band kar diya, India India chalu rakha.
Executive: Baat to ye hai.
Customer: Haan, wo IndiaMART ki taraf se, haan. Kyunki wo, kyunki verbal baat thi. Humne bhi document secure nahi kiye. Wo baat rane gole me ho gayi. Mera bada dil jala jab inhone mere ko ye kiya aur mujhe mera export license bana hua hai. Mai export bhi kar raha hu. To har ek aadmi chahta hai mujhe zyada pahunche.
Executive: Achha. Achha. To dekho, zyada lag jaaye par aadmi ko fayda hona chahiye, tabhi to aap logo ko pay kare na?
Customer: Dil jala baitha hua hai mera.
Executive: Haan, wo to hai. Dekho aapko agar ye lag raha hai usme export ka aapko nahi mila, to ye saara discussion jab aap karoge uska maximizer jab bhi aapko karna hai, to aap mujhe ek baar baat karaana. Mere paas jo possibility hogi export ki, usme jo add on hoga free me, wo mai aapko bata dungi. Abhi ke liye mujhe service se aap batao kuch aisa kuch correction karana hai ya phir wo aapka jo concern hai not satisfied ka, wo mai close kar du? Not satisfied aapne jo diya hai us hisab se aap batao mai kya correction ya kuch usme karwana ho to aap batao kyunki uske liye maine aapko call kiya tha abhi do teen baar.
Customer: Dekhiye, mere bacche, maine yehi kaha tha, kya, abhi thodi der pehle aapse ye zikar kiya hai ki jab ye, ye moment aata hai payment ka len den ka, to ye log bahut achhe tarike behave karte hai. Meena do mahine achha chalta hai uske baad daadi inke hath me ho jaati hai. Ye jo marzi kare, inhe hum kuch nahi...
Executive: Sir, aap payment mat karna. Mai nahi keh rahi hu aapse payment ke liye. Mai abhi bas ye bol rahi hu ki aapka jo not satisfied wala problem hai, usme aapko dikkat kya hai? Payment ke liye maine waise hi nahi call kiya aapko. Wo to aap Ranjit ji se discussion kar rahe ho. To jab aapko karna hoga tab aap bata dena. Mai abhi payment ke liye aapko kuch bhi nahi bol rahi hu karne ke liye. Na aapko karna hai abhi aage to mat kariye. But abhi aapka concern jo hai not satisfied wala, wo abhi dikkat abhi usme hai aapko to bataiye. Mai usme kuch aur karwana hoga to mai karwa dungi. Jo bhi cheeze sudharni hogi aapke account me.
Customer: Aapne jo baat kari hai, wo do hi baatein kari hai. Wo aapne sunni hai. Wo meri puri kar do, mai abhi satisfied kar deta hu.
Executive: Sir, satisfied aap usme likh kar ke thodi kar denge. Wo to ek hi baar jaata hai, wo chala gaya tha lekin aapse mai samajhna ye chah rahi hu, aapko dikkat export wali hai. Export wali dikkat ke liye aap jab ye maximizer karaoge...
Customer: Uske baad bhi se, baat meri bacche baat nahi samajh rahe par agar teen saal ka agreement mera aapka hua hai, to mere ko bhi, aapko bhi bound hona hai teen saal tak aur jo baat kari hai usse amal hona chahiye.
Executive: Sir, ek cheez aapko batau maximizer ya phir koi bhi aap jab package shuru me jo chala rahe the aapne IndiaMART me aapko export bhi milta tha uske saath, jo aap package chala rahe the kisi bhi package me export included nahi tha, kabhi bhi nahi tha. Kyunki IndiaMART ke liye export...
Customer: Mujhe, bacche meri pichhe ka record utha ke dekhe bolo, to aapko milega mai export ki buylead mujhe milti thi. Uske baad band kar di.
Executive: Sir, ye cheez aap, are sir ye cheez mai nahi keh rahi hu ki aapke usme kabhi aapko mila nahi ya business kabhi aapne nahi kara IndiaMART se export ka, aapne kiya hoga. Lekin jo packages design the pehle wo saare domestic ke the. Aapko hum export ka kuch complimentary apni taraf se dete the. But jo packages the saare aap agar proposal jo aapne us time bhi likhit wale proposal jo approve kare hai na, usko bhi aap padhoge to usme kisi me bhi export humare yaha se complimentary nahi tha kabhi bhi. Uske baad jab hum aapko extra de rahe hai, extra me jo IndiaMART hai usne waha pe saari cheeze analyze kari tab wo ja kar ke separate kara ki isme bhi buyer base badh raha hai. Tab ja kar ke sir alag kara hai. Aapko kabhi bhi likhit me aapke jo proposal aap hamesha approve karte hai na har ek teen saal pe, usme bhi kahi pe bhi nahi likha rehta hai ki hum aapko export de rahe hai. Buylead aapko hamesha se humne jo di hai domestic ki hi di hai. Bataiye proposal pe bhi domestic mention hai. Wo hum aapko shuru me dete the but aisa nahi hai ki wo aage tak continue rahega. Wo to client ko apni taraf se jo team de rahi hai IndiaMART ki, add on de rahi hai wo aapko. Ho sakta hai aage bhi kuch cheeze aur add on ho jaaye lekin ab export alag ho chuka hai. Export ek badi market hai ye to aapko bhi pata hai aap kar rahe ho business. To bas wo problem hai. But mai aapka ek solution ye nikal sakti hu abhi ke liye, aap jab ye maximizer karaoge agar is, is mahine me, to usme aapka kuch leads jo hoti hai mai aapko kuch usme alag se free of cost lead export ki allocate kar dungi. Agar aap is mahine jab bhi abhi Ranjit ji se aap baat kar rahe ho na, to wo aap karaoge to usme mai add on karwa dungi.
Customer: Sir, regular rehni chahiye. Nahi to mujhe batao kitna kitna kharcha, mere ko batao kuch time ke liye nahi, mere ko to teen saal ka agreement hai to teen saal tak regular rehni chahiye aur apna ek kharcha bata do ki hum ye denge.
Executive: Sir, mai wahi to keh rahi hu ki export ka jo aapko bata rahi hu wo pehle ek saath combined tha lekin package aapka domestic ka hi banta tha. Proposal bhi aapne domestic ka approve kara teen saal pehle, 6 saal pehle ya 10 saal pehle. Us time aapka export usme hum complimentary yaani ki free of cost dete the. Ab free of cost dena band ho gaya hai. Abhi aapko maine ye bola hai...
Executive: Abhi aapko maine ye bola hai jo maximizer wala hai, aapko mai usme kuch lead de dungi. Wo kuch lead aapke ek time ke liye valid hai, ek saal ke liye. Aap usko ek baar me khatam kar lo, aap usko ek din me khatam kar lo ya aap usko pure ek saal chalao. Wo teen saal wala jo pehle chalta tha waisa kuch bhi aapko nahi bol rahi hu karne ke liye na hi aisa kuch ho paayega. Aapko mai kuch ho sakta hai 10 lead ya phir 6 lead aise kuch aapko bata dungi usi time jab aap loge ye.
Customer: Mere ko to, mere ko to export chahiye chahiye. Mai aapko bata raha hu, ulta kharcha bata do bas.
Executive: Sir, export agar aapko chahiye to uske packages alag se hai.
Executive: Uska kharcha aapka ek lakh ek saal ka hai, 1,30,000 plus 18% jisme 10 weekly lead milti hai, hafte ki 10 lead aapko milegi export ki. Aap apne according jo bhi lead aapko sahi samajh aa rahi hai aap consume kar lijiye to wo silver ka ek package hai humara. Jisme aapko final karke wo 1,15,000 plus 18% ka aapko padh jaayega. 1,30,000 me seedhe seedhe 15,000 ka discount aapka padh jaayega.
Customer: Mai ek saal ke liye nahi bhi chah raha hu na. Jab teen saal ka agreement hoga to teen saal tak ki baat karo aur jo paisa paani ka wo mujhe batao.
Executive: Teen saal ka.
Executive: Teen saal ka sir usme aapka jo package hai wo 3,30,000 plus 18% ka hai, percent ka hai to aapko usme jo discount milke padh jaayega wo 2,80,000 plus 18% ka padega export ka teen saal ka.
Customer: Haan mujhe bata dena na.
Executive: Haan aapko bata to diya 3,30,000 plus 18% hai, teen saal ka, 10 weekly lead silver ka package aur usme aapko 2,80,000 plus 18% ka discount ke rate me aapko padh jaayega aur wahi same aapka 10 weekly lead teen saal tak ke liye ye export ka package chalta rahega.
Customer: Haan mujhe ye WhatsApp kar do. Ye jo plan de rahe hai na aap, ye WhatsApp kar do.
Executive: Mai aapko bhej de rahi hu. Baaki aap ye batao service me aapko kuch aur karana ho to mai Ranjit ji se baat karke wo correction karwa dungi. Kyunki mera main call aapka isi ke liye tha. Aapko dikkat kya thi, iske liye call tha main aapko aaj.
Customer: Theek hai. To mai ba Ranjit se baat kar lunga.
Executive: Haan, baaki mai aapka not satisfied wala aisa to nahi ki account manager se aapko dikkat hai to mai wo uske liye aapko dikkat ho aisa kuch, aisa to nahi hai na? Account manager se problem?
Customer: Ranjit ji se problem aisa kuch to nahi hai na aapka this concern?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Ek minute plan ki mai baat bata raha hu ye, ek to ghar andar ke mai office me jaata hu.
Executive: Nahi, mai aapko bhej de rahi hu.
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute. Mai andar office me jaane do mujhe.
Customer: Hmm. Mashino ka shor hai.
Customer: Kaam kar rahe hai na karigar. Haan, ab bolo aap, kya kare?
Executive: Haan, mai ye keh rahi hu ki Ranjit ji jo aapke account manager hai unse to koi samasya nahi hai na aapko? Service ke baare me theek se batate hai?
Customer: Na, na, na. Achha, theek hai. Kyunki, dekhiye beta mai ye, ye keh raha hu ki jab baat hoti hai is cheez ki, payment ki, tabhi Ranjit ji nazar aate hai, beech me koi nazar nahi aata.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Beech me jaise abhi mera agreement hua aur maine payment aapko kar di. Uske baad to Allah jaane, Maula jaane, bas jo karm chalna hai chalta chala jaayega.
Executive: Achha. Nahi to aapki...
Executive: Dekho mai ek cheez batau aapko, aapke jo main sabse zyada contactable person hote hai wo account manager hi hota hai. Agar aapka account manager aapse baat kar raha hai barabar, to achhi baat hai. Aap unse koi bhi cheez bataana chaho ki aap apne jo manager hai ya aap unse discussion karna chaho to aap unko bata do to wo call arrange kara denge. Abhi kya hai ki mere paas concern aapka aaya hai kyunki aapne Ranjit ji ke service pe not satisfied diya hai. Tab maine aapko call lagaya. Otherwise aapko Ranjit ji call karte jo aapke account manager hai. Tabhi mai aapse puch rahi hu barabar ki Ranjit ji ki service me to koi dikkat nahi hai na? Mai not satisfied jo aapne diya hai unki service pe aapne de diya hai. Usko mai close kar du concern?
Customer: Kar do, kar do.
Executive: Aapko dekho dikkat agar kuch reh rahi hai na aisa aage ke liye aapko koi call nahi kar raha hai to aap jo aapke account manager hote hai aap unse call karke jo bhi aapko person se bol, baat karni hai, aap unko bol do ki aap apne manager se baat karaiye ya phir aap apni us team se baat karaiye.
Customer: Na, na, na, na, na. Ranjit abhi chal rahe hai. Abhi saal baad ye dusri company join kar lenge zyada milega to dusra aayega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aisa hota hai.
Executive: Haan, ye to sir, ye to sir sahi keh rahe ho aap ye cheez to hai lekin aapka account manager hamesha aapka jo IndiaMART ka account rehta hai, usme naam dikhta hai. To ye dekhiye ye cheez to koi bhi control nahi kar sakta. Aapke yaha bhi koi staff aapne rakha ho agar wo chhod ke chala jaaye to wo aap bhi unko hamesha ke liye nahi rakh paaoge. To abhi aap jo cheeze check kar sakte ho apne account manager ke through.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi. Mere ko 50 saal ho gaye kaam karte hue. 20 saal bhai ke saath kiya. 30 saal ho gaye mujhe apna kaam kiye hue. Mere paas 30 saal, 30 saal se hi ladke lage hue hai. Wahi ladke lage hue hai, nahi ki bharti ki hai. Udhar purane the wo mere wafadar hai wo ab bhi mere saath hai. Batware me mere saath mile the aur ab bhi mere saath kaam kar rahe hai. Aur mai pura saath deta hu.
Executive: Achha, achha.
Executive: Achha lekin baat ye hai na ki sir badi company hai log aate hai chhod ke chale jaate hai, kuch log tike rehte hai. Wo wali baat hai jaise mai 4 saal se hu.
Customer: Haan, to wo cheez to mai aapko dekho nahi bol sakti hu ki sir aapke liye Ranjit...
Customer: Theek hai, apne aap consider kar lo, isse done kar do aur mai Ranjit se apne aap baat kar lunga sab, kal karunga kal. Mera gala baitha hua hai, mai kal baat karunga.
Executive: Theek hai, mai aapko baaki WhatsApp bhi kar de rahi hu. Aap mera number bhi save kar lena, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai beta, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, theek hai, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer gave 'not satisfied' feedback.

- Wants export buyleads as part of subscription.

- Dissatisfied with post-payment service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained export packages are separate.

- Offered free export leads if maximizer is purchased.

- Explained domestic vs export packages.

- Agreed to close the 'not satisfied' feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share package details on WhatsApp.

- Customer will discuss with Ranjit and decide.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, export, buyleads, not satisfied
